title: Fumio Miyashita Discography (1984-2011)
description:
Fumio Miyashita Discography (1984-2011)

Artist: Fumio Miyashita
Album: Discography
Year: 1984-2011
Genre: New Age, Meditative
CDs: 16 Albums
Format: MP3 192-320 kbps
Size: 1.42 GB
In 1949: born in Nagano, Japan
In the year 1965, began his musical career
participate in a rock musical worldwide called "Hair"
formed "Farout" and "Far East Family Band"
found its way to the international career with progressive rock on a tour abroad and releasing their albums worldwidely
The Grammy award winner KITARO played keyboards for the band FUMIO, Far East Family Band,
In 1977 he moved to the U.S. and embarked on an ambitious U.S. tour
participation in the early years of the new age movement in relation to Eastern philosophy,
began creating instrumental music made ??full use of synthesizer
In 1981, after returning to Japan, he created his own studio in his home in Iizuna highland Nagano and launched BIWA record label. continued to create their original sound, established its status as healing music authority

Albums List:
-------------
1984 - New Lights - Journey To Space 
1989 - White Morning - Healing Music 
1991 - Angel Of Healing 
1991 - Angel Of Joy 
1995 - Angel's Whisper 
1995 - Meditation 
2004 - Eternity 
2005 - Light - The Healing Rain Forest 
2005 - Sea - The Healing Rain Forest 
2006 - Eternity 2 - Healing New Best 
2006 - Flower - The Healing Rain Forest 
2006 - Water - The Healing Rain Forest 
2006 - Wood - The Healing Rain Forest 
2007 - Music For Sleep - Best Of Fumio 
2011 - Air - The Healing Rain Forest 
2011 - Land - The Healing Rain Forest
